sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162030 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_TGT_AMT) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #hsngPrptSvngAccNo# , #taxVvalKrnCd# , #hsngPrptSvngSvngCl# , #jnngDt# , ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM11 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'Y005' AND COMM_CD = #hsngPrptSvngFnnOrgnCd#) , #hsngPrptSvngFnnCmp# , #hsngPrptSvngPymAmt# , #hsngPrptSvngIncDdcAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #hsngPrptSvngTgtAmt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162030 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo# , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = #taxVvalKrnCd# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL=#hsngPrptSvngSvngCl# , JNNG_DT=#jnngDt# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD=#hsngPrptSvngFnnOrgnCd# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP=#hsngPrptSvngFnnCmp# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT=#hsngPrptSvngPymAmt# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT=#hsngPrptSvngIncDdcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo#

sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162030 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162030 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
